Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

Class AbstractScheduler

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>, ListenerService<WorkUnitEvent,EventListener<WorkUnitEvent>>, Scheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackfillingScheduler, DefaultScheduler, PreemptionScheduler
public abstract class AbstractScheduler extends SimEntity implements Scheduler, ListenerService<WorkUnitEvent,EventListener<WorkUnitEvent>>
Each server has a scheduling policy that defines how the server resources are allocated to work units. This class implements the basic functionality that a scheduling policy should provide.
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

      public abstract void onShutdown()
      This method is invoked by the Simulation before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.

    • sendJobToOwner

      protected void sendJobToOwner(Job job)
      Sends a job back to its owner. That is, schedules an event for the owner to receive the job and process it.
      Parameters:
      job - the job to be returned to the owner

    • startJob

      protected boolean startJob(Job j)
      Tries to start a job on the first available resource and allocates required resources for it.
      Parameters:
      j - the job to be started
      Returns:
      true if the job has been started; false otherwise

    • cancelJob

      protected void cancelJob(Job job)
      Handles job cancellation. This method returns the used time slot back to the resource pool and cancels future simulation events related to the job.
      Parameters:
      job - the job to be cancelled.
